website_summaries.verdict: This 5' teddy offers buyers an extra-large bundle of love at a reasonable price point.
pros: Face, paws, and removable bow tie constructed with soft microfiber
Bear fur is non-shedding and exceedingly plushy
cons: A bit floppy and flimsy – could be stuffed more
Seams have a tendency to come loose

customer_reviews.title: A huge hit (pun intended)!
customer_reviews.text: This bear was purchased as a prop for a musical and also served as our daughter's break-a-leg gift. She was able to see this bear every rehearsal and performance, and take it home at the end of the run. While there are less expensive oversized bears available, many had negative reviews of not being well-stuffed, poor stitching or other noticeable flaws. This bear is huge, well-stuffed, soft and quite the cutie. He arrived quickly, in a vacuum-sealed bag so releasing him is entertaining. More than I would typically pay for a stuffed animal, this giant bear was and continues to be a huge hit.
customer_reviews.author: mommaonabudget

customer_reviews.title: This bear is super soft and very comfortable to lay against
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for me so I would have a life sized bear to hug for when he passed. This bear is super soft and very comfortable to lay against. This is a must buy for anyone that loves bears. You will never be alone as long as you have this bear by your side.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Yanchar

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for My Fiancee (or anyone)
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my fiancee for Christmas. To say it was a big hit is an understatement. I'm not sure if she loves me or the bear more now lol So I recommend it highly for anyone trying to come up with a special gift for that special person in your life.
customer_reviews.author: C. O'Grady

customer_reviews.title: This is a big teddy bear
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loves this. I have to give the company big time credit. The way it was packed was outstanding. I mean almost too good! Its really 5 foot tall and soft. It brought tears to my girlfriends eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney a Jones

customer_reviews.title: Totally Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love this teddy bear. It comes in a box so squished up it takes it awhile to sit up right.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a little boy turning 3. The bear is twice his size, but he makes sure to drag it everywhere. The bear sits at the table for breakfast, it sits next to him on the couch watching cartoons, he cuddles up with it in bed... It's a little bit more firm than I expected, but he doesn't seem to mind.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: For friends Birthday. Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Came in right before my friends birthday party! She wanted a bear so I got her a five foot one! The packaging was very nice, came in a plastic bag inside the box. Very comfy and squishy, great material! Friend absolutely loved it, and people couldn't take their eyes off it!
customer_reviews.author: Terri R. Wooten

customer_reviews.title: Just like the picture! Super cuddly ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Super soft & adorable! I love the pillow it comes with too! I'm 37wks pregnant so I bought it to use as a prop for photos , also because I just love giant stuffed animals lol totally worth it! It is quite heavy for me to pick up , my husband had to lug it around for me over his shoulder. Lalalalove this bear :)

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bear!
customer_reviews.text: We love this bear! He is really soft - I was quite surprised at how soft he is. We are giving him to our 8-year old daughter Christmas morning. I know she will love him. He is huge and cuddly. He came wrapped in a plastic bag (compressed really) and packed in a box inside another box. When we removed him, he "grew" immediately and formed up perfectly. He can sit in a chair just like a human. We are really happy with this purchase and feel this bear is very high quality for the price point. We couldn't be more pleased and know others will love this bear too!

customer_reviews.title: The bear arrived on time and packaged in a plain cardboard box which was perfect to keep the bear a surprise for Christmas morni
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this bear as a Christmas gift for our daughter - a giant teddy bear was at the top of her list this year. The bear arrived on time and packaged in a plain cardboard box which was perfect to keep the bear a surprise for Christmas morning. Unfortunately when we took the bear out of the box it had several holes in various places. I contacted Yesbears right away and they replaced the bear at no extra cost and very fast. The new bear is perfect - very soft, good quality!! I would highly recomed Yesbears if you are looking for teddy bear for someone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I love the large size of the bear, how soft it is, and the fact that it doesn't shed at all. It is exactly as advertised, so I recommend it. My son likes to wrestle the bear, and has a blast. Because of this, there have been several little holes ripped open along seams that I've had to stitch up, and I'm sure there will be more. However, I don't blame the makers for this; I don't think the bears were made to be wrestling opponents. :-) Regardless, it turns out it's a great one for my little guy. I also like to buy American when possible, so I'm happy to support American businesses when I can.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love the bear! Came a day earlier than expected & is gonna put a big smile on my girlfriends face!

customer_reviews.text: Quality seems good and it is technically as big as advertised, but its pretty floppy and the legs account for most of the size. The actual body is pretty small.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Valentine's Day gift and great shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Product was perfect and arrived on time. Contacted the seller and did receive a response within 10 minutes. The best part was the bear being shipped in an air tight bag, which allowed for the box to only be about two feet tall. Once you open the bag, the bear grows and grows and it looks great. It did not have any tears or rips and seemed to be in tact. My girlfriend loved it for Valentine's Day (gave it to her early because the bear was too big to hide in an apartment).
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: best huge bear out there

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bear
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bear for a 2 year old girl that is in the hospital. The little girl had a bone marrow transplant and this bear arrived the day that was supposed to be her most difficult day. The bear made her so happy and helped her through the tough time. The bear is HUGE and AWESOME. This bear will make all ages happy. The bear arrived only 3 days after I placed my order. This bear ships quickly! West coast should probably expect the shipping to take a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Siehara

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase

Its just a very high quality bear at a great price. I can highly recommend this one as a gift for a child or fun decor for anyone's home!

product_meta.title: YESBEARS Giant Teddy Bear 5 Foot Brown Microfiber Bowtie & Face (Pillow Included)
feature_bullets: UPGRADES:Replaced Paws & Face area with "Microfiber" Enhance Softer Feeling. NO MORE Strings Hanging around the mouth replaced with "Perfect Smile" & PAWS embroidery
Ultra Soft & Huggable Experience & Environmentally friendly & Removable Bowtie (Made with Ultra Soft Microfiber)
No Shedding & "Fully Stuffed" Guarantee Satisfaction Made in U.S.
NOTE This Bear MUST *ONLY* be from YesBears at Checkout, to be100% AUTHENTIC.
